original_text:
And the glory of the Lord will be revealed,
    and all people will see it together.
For the mouth of the Lord has spoken.”
korean_text: 여호와의 영광이 나타나고 모든 육체가 그것을 함께 보리라 이는 여호와의 입이 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And the glory of the Lord will be revealed
and all people will see it together
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성이 그것을 함께 보게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: For the mouth of the Lord has spoken
